timeline.author: caponetto

timeline.body:
I'd suggest to extract each table on its own class following a common contract.
Thus, `DataTransferExportPopUpView` could add and treat each part of the Accordion in a generic way.
Also, it would allow to add any other kind of exporting item more easily.
Just a thought :)

timeline.body: is the `isExportNavigation()` still relevant? the navigation is always exported in the custom export
timeline.bodyText: is the isExportNavigation() still relevant? the navigation is always exported in the custom export
timeline.bodyHTML: is the isExportNavigation() still relevant? the navigation is always exported in the custom export
timeline.author: barboras7

replies.bodyText:
I would let it in case we want to allow users to select this option in future. For example, I did create [1] so users could export a single page along its dependencies so they can it on runtime. In that case navigation would not be needed.
[1] https://issues.redhat.com/browse/AF-2459
replies.author: jesuino

timeline.message: AF-2456: Support Gradual Export in Data Transfer API
Removing Warning state and improving export wizard
Add data transfer to a Dashbuilder menu
